name: Heian Godan
description: The fifth and final kata in the Heian series, featuring the first jumping technique (tobi-komi) in Shōtōkan (step 19). Introduces crescent kicks, hook punches, and complex flowing movements. Known for its combination of quick and slow movements requiring timing, skill, and fluidity.

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: むすびだち
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs

subMoves.hiragana: ようい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: はちじだち
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, step out to hachiji-dachi position and assume the ready stance (yōi) with fists clenched and thumbs on top of the fingers

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうでうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Turn head left, move left foot into back stance with hidari chūdan uchi-uke

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: On the spot in back stance, execute right reverse punch to solar plexus level

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん かぎづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: へいそくだち
subMoves.description: Slowly bring left foot to right foot in attention stance, turn head right, execute left hook punch to middle level

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうでうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Move right foot into back stance with right middle-level inside forearm block

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: On the spot in back stance, execute left reverse punch to solar plexus level

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん かぎづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: へいそくだち
subMoves.description: Slowly bring right foot to left foot in attention stance, turn head forward, execute right hook punch to middle level

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん もろてうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Move right foot into back stance with right augmented middle-level block from left to right

subMoves.hiragana: げだん じゅうじうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Advance left foot into front stance with low, downward X-block using fists, arms crossed

subMoves.hiragana: かいしょう じょうだん じゅうじうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Quickly after step 8, on the spot (left foot can be slightly drawn back), raise crossed arms and open hands for upper-level X-block

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ りょうしょう じゅうじ ちゅうだん おさえうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Turn both hands palm to palm to right hip (as if pressing down)

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん ずき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Make fists with both hands. Drive the left fist toward at chest level, right fist to right hip.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Advance right foot into front stance with right direct punch to middle level

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこふみこみ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Shift weight backward, rotate 180° counter-clockwise on left foot with strong hip rotation, stamp right foot into horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Simultaneously execute right sweeping block

moves.japaneseName: Hidari chūdan kake-uke / Migi chūdan mikazuki-geri

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん はいしゅうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Turn head left, open left hand, place both arms in front of the body (right atop the left underarm). Extend left hand (starting flat) in a circular motion from under the right elbow toward the left of the body (chūdan), turning the hand to vertical at the end (haishu-uke or kake-uke). Right fist is simultaneously placed at the right hip. Slow movement as if drawing a bow.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん さしょうに みかづきげり
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり あち だち
subMoves.description: Execute right crescent kick with sole of foot into left hand, pivoting 180° counter-clockwise on left foot

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん まえ えんぴうち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Continue rotation, place right foot in horse stance and strike right elbow into open left hand

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん もろてうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎあし まえ こさだち
subMoves.description: Look right. Keep right foot in place, slide left foot behind with heel up into cross stance, augmented block from left to right

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うほうづきあげ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだりあし れのじだち
subMoves.description: Move left foot back slightly, straighten (slightly bent) right leg into L-stance, turn head and hips left with upward movement of both fists

subMoves.hiragana: げだん じゅうじうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: こさだち
subMoves.description: Rotate 180° on left foot, make high jump towards the south to land in low cross stance facing east with downward X-block using fists

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん もろてうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Move right foot towards the right into narrow front stance with right augmented middle-level block from left to right

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ながし しゅとうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだりあし ぜんくつ
subMoves.description: Look left and turn left while keeping feet positions. Open both hands. Bring your left hand to your lower right abdomen (gedan), palm down, and your right hand beside your right ear, palm forward. Shift into hidari-ashi-zenkutsu while moving your left hand to your right shoulder (palm in) and perform with your right hand a gedan shutō-uchikomi, palm up.

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Switch to right back stance (may move the left foot a bit). Close fists and simultaneously execute left sweeping block and right upper inside block with closed fist upward and backward.

subMoves.hiragana: じょうたい そのまま へいそくだち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Keeping the upper body position unchanged, bring the left foot to the right foot

moves.japaneseName: Ushō jōdan nagashi-uke / hidari gedan shutō-uchikomi

subMoves.technique: Ushō jōdan nagashi-uke / hidari gedan shutō-uchikomi
subMoves.hiragana: うしょう じょうだん ながしうけ / ひだり げだん しゅとううちこみ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎあし ぜんくつ
subMoves.description: Open both hands. Bring your right hand to your lower right abdomen (gedan), palm down, and your left hand beside your left ear, palm forward. Shift into migi-ashi-zenkutsu while moving your right hand to your left shoulder (palm in) and perform with your left hand a gedan shutō-uchikomi, palm up.

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい / ひだり じょうだん うちうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Switch to left back stance (may move right foot a bit). Close fists and simultaneously execute right sweeping block and left upper inside block with closed fist upward and backward

subMoves.hiragana: ようい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: はちじだち
subMoves.description: Step back to hachiji-dachi position and assume the ready stance (yōi)

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: むすびだち
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs
